ยง Homebrew and Setting Content for Exalted 3rd Edition

Welcome to Venture, a website I created and maintain for sharing my Exalted third edition content.

This website started life as a campaign website for a specific Dragon-Blooded game I was running for some of my friends. That game is long since concluded; we called it "Venture" for lack of a better name. Now, this site is a repository of the many words I have written in relation to Creation, the Dragon-Blooded, and my other work for Exalted content.

Sutra says...

A little box like this is an indication that I, Sutra, the author of the material, am speaking directly to you, the Reader.

ยง Resources

  • The Exalted Fan Discord;
  • Lot Casting Atemi, a character management tool;
  • Technical resources for this website: 11ty, hyperscript, and missing.css

ยง About me

My general internet name is Sutra. I started playing Exalted when I was 13 years old and have been in love with the franchise ever since. I am very active on the Exalted Discord where you can ping me as @ElectronSutra if you have any questions or comments. I do not use other social media, so Discord is really the best way to reach me.

If you notice a typo or other easy fix, please consider submitting a PR at the site's repo on GitHub.
